code: import{useEffect}from"react";import PropTypes from"prop-types";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getIsLoggedIn,getUsersLoadingStatus,loadUsersList}from"../../../store/users";import{loadQualitiesList}from"../../../store/qualities";import{loadProfessionsList}from"../../../store/professions";var AppLoader=function AppLoader(_ref){var children=_ref.children;var dispatch=useDispatch();var isLoggedIn=useSelector(getIsLoggedIn());var usersStatusLoading=useSelector(getUsersLoadingStatus());useEffect(function(){dispatch(loadQualitiesList());dispatch(loadProfessionsList());if(isLoggedIn){dispatch(loadUsersList());}},[isLoggedIn]);if(usersStatusLoading)return"loading";return children;};AppLoader.propTypes={children:PropTypes.oneOfType([PropTypes.arrayOf(PropTypes.node),PropTypes.node])};export default AppLoader;
